DENTIST: A medical doctor who specializes in _______ry.
DOCTOR: A physician; a member of the medical profession; one who is trained and licensed to heal the sick or injured. The final examination and qualification may award a ______ degree in which case the post-nominal letters are D.O., DPM, M.D., DMD, DDS, in the US or MBBS in the UK.
PHARMACIST: A professional who dispenses prescription drugs in a hospital or retail pharmacy.
SURGEON: One who performs surgery; a doctor who performs operations on people or animals.
